- i believe incorporating a space bar feature to click through the clips would be more effective for the user

column26: I think so. Being blunt, the university grind sucks and it's hard to find the motivation to keep pushing through lecture after lecture after lecture. Having something fun like this that breaks up the monotony I think is a great way to alleviate a little bit of that university burn out and revitalize some of that motivation to do the work. For me especially, I think this could be a helpful study tool because I am very easily distracted by anything even marginally more interesting than staring at a textbook, so having something more engaging to study with would be really beneficial.
